org.apache.flink.runtime.instance

类 SimpleSlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.instance.Slot
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.instance.SimpleSlot

  • public class SimpleSlot
extends Slot
    A SimpleSlot represents a single slot on a TaskManager instance, or a slot within a shared slot.

    If this slot is part of a SharedSlot, then the parent attribute will point to that shared slot. If not, then the parent attribute is null.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      Task being executed in the slot.

      The locality attached to the slot, defining whether the slot was allocated at the desired location.
      private static java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReferenceFieldUpdater<SimpleSlot,Execution> VERTEX_UPDATER
      The updater used to atomically swap in the execution

    • 字段详细资料

      • VERTEX_UPDATER

        private static final java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReferenceFieldUpdater<SimpleSlot,Execution> VERTEX_UPDATER
        The updater used to atomically swap in the execution

      • executedTask

        private volatile Execution executedTask
        Task being executed in the slot. Volatile to force a memory barrier and allow for correct double-checking

      • locality

        private volatile Locality locality
        The locality attached to the slot, defining whether the slot was allocated at the desired location.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • SimpleSlot

        public SimpleSlot(JobID jobID,
                  SlotOwner owner,
                  TaskManagerLocation location,
                  int slotNumber,
                  TaskManagerGateway taskManagerGateway)
        Creates a new simple slot that stands alone and does not belong to shared slot.
        参数:
        jobID - The ID of the job that the slot is allocated for.
        owner - The component from which this slot is allocated.
        location - The location info of the TaskManager where the slot was allocated from
        slotNumber - The number of the task slot on the instance.
        taskManagerGateway - The gateway to communicate with the TaskManager of this slot

      • SimpleSlot

        public SimpleSlot(JobID jobID,
                  SlotOwner owner,
                  TaskManagerLocation location,
                  int slotNumber,
                  TaskManagerGateway taskManagerGateway,
                  @Nullable
                  SharedSlot parent,
                  @Nullable
                  AbstractID groupID)
        Creates a new simple slot that belongs to the given shared slot and is identified by the given ID.
        参数:
        jobID - The ID of the job that the slot is allocated for.
        owner - The component from which this slot is allocated.
        location - The location info of the TaskManager where the slot was allocated from
        slotNumber - The number of the simple slot in its parent shared slot.
        taskManagerGateway - to communicate with the associated task manager.
        parent - The parent shared slot.
        groupID - The ID that identifies the group that the slot belongs to.

      • SimpleSlot

        public SimpleSlot(AllocatedSlot allocatedSlot,
                  SlotOwner owner,
                  int slotNumber)
        Creates a new simple slot that stands alone and does not belong to shared slot.
        参数:
        allocatedSlot - The allocated slot that this slot represents.
        owner - The component from which this slot is allocated.
        slotNumber - The number of the task slot on the instance.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getNumberLeaves

        public int getNumberLeaves()
        从类复制的说明: Slot
        Gets the number of simple slots that are at the leaves of the tree of slots.
        指定者:
        getNumberLeaves 在类中 Slot
        返回:
        The number of simple slots at the leaves.

      • getExecutedVertex

        public Execution getExecutedVertex()
        Gets the task execution attempt currently executed in this slot. This may return null, if no task execution attempt has been placed into this slot.
        返回:
        The slot's task execution attempt, or null, if no task is executed in this slot, yet.

      • setExecutedVertex

        public boolean setExecutedVertex(Execution executedVertex)
        Atomically sets the executed vertex, if no vertex has been assigned to this slot so far.
        参数:
        executedVertex - The vertex to assign to this slot.
        返回:
        True, if the vertex was assigned, false, otherwise.

      • getLocality

        public Locality getLocality()
        Gets the locality information attached to this slot.
        返回:
        The locality attached to the slot.

      • setLocality

        public void setLocality(Locality locality)
        Attached locality information to this slot.
        参数:
        locality - The locality attached to the slot.

      • releaseSlot

        public void releaseSlot()
        从类复制的说明: Slot
        This method cancels and releases the slot and all its sub-slots. After this method completed successfully, the slot will be in state "released", and the Slot.isReleased() method will return true. If this slot is a simple slot, it will be returned to its instance. If it is a shared slot, it will release all of its sub-slots and release itself.
        指定者:
        releaseSlot 在类中 Slot

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 Slot
